en.today: You could be confronted by new information that puts you in a challenging position, dearest Aries. While the Gemini Sun enters a harsh t-square with the nodes of fate, even the best-laid plans are liable to go sideways. Luckily, the Capricorn Moon steps in to help you recalibrate this afternoon. Step back to view your situation from a higher perspective, choosing the most practical way forward. Secrecy will serve you when it comes to getting your affairs in order but don't hesitate to ask for help from a trusted ally. Tension manifests when Luna squares Chiron tonight, and you should avoid putting too much pressure on yourself or others.

en.today: Choose your battles wisely as the Gemini Sun squares off with the nodes of fate, dear Leo. This energy will trigger stubborn behaviors and power struggles, threatening to cause rifts within your social sphere. Avoid conflict by staying grounded and connected with your senses, recognizing when to fight and when to take the high road. Healthy distractions find you when the Capricorn Moon stirs this afternoon, helping you align with your goals and the work required to actualize them. Listen to the messages your body sends you when Luna squares Chiron this evening, taking time to unwind and release stress.

en.today: The Sun squares off with the nodes of fate, beloved Gemini, stirring up tensions while heightening emotions. There's a risk you could get caught up in drama or feel energetically stretched thin, making it difficult to focus. Do what you can to mitigate problems as they arise by sticking to your boundaries and maintaining compassion for yourself and others. The Capricorn Moon lends aid this afternoon, presenting opportunities to identify the root of issues so they can be squashed once and for all. Watch out for peer pressure and gossip when Luna and Chiron form a tense aspect tonight.
